function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in waste collection time of 72 hours","Impact":"Potential for COVID-19 to survive in the environment","Mitigation":"Implement timely waste collection protocols","Technologies":"Efficient waste management systems","People":"General public, waste service workers, and public health","Owner":"Local authorities, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Limited sharing of patient data between health authorities and waste services sector","Impact":"Lack of coordination for effective virus containment and management","Mitigation":"Establish data sharing mechanisms without compromising privacy","Technologies":"Secure data sharing platforms, encrypted communication channels","People":"Health authorities, waste services sector, and public health organizations","Owner":"Government health departments, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Transmission of viral aerosols through wastewater systems","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, wastewater system maintenance, and enhanced building codes","Technologies":"Upgraded ventilation systems, wastewater filtration systems, and building control technologies","People":"Residents, building maintenance staff, and public health","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities, and municipal governing bodies"}]}
